name: CLARITY_SER
description: The CLARITY_SER table contains high-level information about your provider records. These records may be caregivers, resources, classes, devices, and modalities.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the provider record. This ID can be encrypted.

columns.name: PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the provider record.
